page.title: 19BRAY FILM STUDIOS - WINDSOR
page.content:
{Bray Studios}does not in fact have any studios. It has three sound stages. They are mainly used for Commercials, sometimes even television, serials and films. The films cost between 3 and 4 million pounds and 12 million pounds.Commercials cost between 50,000 and 120,000 pounds.
Their latest serial is called "Paradise Postponed", which lasts 12 hours.
The twelve people that are employed there are local. Bray Studios owns 4.89 acres. It has 5 buildings. The largest is number one.{Bray Studios}is 30 years old. They make 50 to 60 commercials a year. It takes about 5 weeks to make a film and 5 days to build a set. It is hard to make British films as it is so expensive.
